block.p: SEMEL-Pearl, 85. Beloved wife of the late David, devoted mother of Martin Semel, Sharon Kalvert and Cindy Linder, and mother-in-law of Paula Semel, Michael Kalvert and Steve Linder, cherished grandmother of Michael, Alissa and David and great-grandmother of Zachary, Kate and Rachel. Service Thursday, May 18, 10 AM, at Gutterman's, 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, New York.
